title: The One With Two Parts, part 1

questions.question: What is the name of the restaurant where Joey and Chandler see Ursula?
questions.correct_answer: Riff's Restaurant
questions.explanation: Joey and Chandler see Ursula at Riff's Restaurant, where she is working as a waitress.

questions.question: What is the reason Ursula gives for working at Riff's Restaurant?
options: Because it's close to her home and the aprons are cute
Because she wants to meet new people
questions.correct_answer: Because it's close to her home and the aprons are cute
questions.explanation: Ursula tells Joey and Chandler that she works at Riff's because it's close to her home and the aprons are cute.

questions.question: What does Ross's monkey keep doing to his answering machine messages?
questions.correct_answer: Erasing them
questions.explanation: Ross tells his friends that his monkey keeps erasing the messages on his answering machine.

questions.question: What is the name of the couple who introduce themselves in the Lamaze class?
questions.correct_answer: The Rostins
questions.explanation: The couple who introduce themselves in the Lamaze class are J.C. and Michael Rostin.

questions.question: What does Ross say is 'out of control'?
questions.correct_answer: His monkey
questions.explanation: Ross tells his friends that his monkey is out of control.

questions.question: What does Marcel do to the TV remote control?
options: He presses a combination of keys that changes the language to Spanish
questions.correct_answer: He presses a combination of keys that changes the language to Spanish
questions.explanation: Marcel presses a combination of keys on the TV remote control that changes the language to Spanish.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who comes to Chandler's office?
questions.correct_answer: Nina Bookbinder
questions.explanation: The woman who comes to Chandler's office is Nina Bookbinder.

questions.question: What does Chandler tell Nina is 'out of whack'?
questions.correct_answer: His WENUS
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Nina that his WENUS (Weekly Estimated Net Usage Statistics) is out of whack.

questions.question: What does Phoebe want for her birthday?
options: Bath salts from Crabtree and Evelyn
questions.correct_answer: Bath salts from Crabtree and Evelyn
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Rachel that she would like bath salts from Crabtree and Evelyn for her birthday.

questions.question: What does Joey ask Phoebe to do with the cardigan?
questions.correct_answer: Try it on
questions.explanation: Joey asks Phoebe to try on the cardigan to see if it fits Ursula.

questions.question: What is the name of the class that Ross, Carol, and Susan are attending?
questions.correct_answer: Lamaze class
questions.explanation: The class that Ross, Carol, and Susan are attending is a Lamaze class.

questions.question: What does Ross do with the doll in the Lamaze class?
options: He steps on it and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it
questions.correct_answer: He steps on it and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it
questions.explanation: Ross steps on the doll in the Lamaze class and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it.

questions.question: What does Mr. Heckles complain about to Monica?
options: The noise level in the apartment
questions.correct_answer: The noise level in the apartment
questions.explanation: Mr. Heckles complains to Monica about the noise level in the apartment.

questions.question: What does Chandler tell his boss about Nina?
options: That she is doing a great job
That she is not doing well
That she has a psychiatrist who says she is fragile
That she is quitting her job
questions.correct_answer: That she has a psychiatrist who says she is fragile
questions.explanation: Chandler tells his boss that Nina has a psychiatrist who says she is fragile.

questions.question: What does Ross say is 'just one day'?
options: The day he becomes a father
The day he graduates from college
questions.correct_answer: The birth of his baby
questions.explanation: Ross says that the birth of his baby is 'just one day'.

questions.question: What does Susan say is 'just one day'?
options: The day they move in together
questions.correct_answer: The birth of the baby
questions.explanation: Susan says that the birth of the baby is 'just one day'.

questions.question: What does Chandler's boss say about the Annual Net Usage Statistics?
options: That they are the best they have ever been
That they are the worst they have ever been
questions.correct_answer: That they are the worst they have ever been
questions.explanation: Chandler's boss says that the Annual Net Usage Statistics are the worst they have ever been.

questions.question: What does Joey say he likes about Ursula?
questions.correct_answer: Her beauty
questions.explanation: Joey says that he likes Ursula's beauty.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her relationship with her sister Ursula?
options: That they are not close at all
That they are sisters but not twins
questions.correct_answer: That they are twins
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that she and Ursula are twins.

questions.question: What does Ross say he is going to do in the Lamaze class?
options: He is going to be the coach
He is going to be the mother
He is going to learn how to change a diaper
He is going to learn how to breathe
questions.correct_answer: He is going to learn how to breathe
questions.explanation: Ross says that he is going to learn how to breathe in the Lamaze class.

questions.question: What does Carol say she is not going to do?
options: She is not going to have the baby
She is not going to get married
She is not going to move in with Susan
She is not going to push the baby out
questions.correct_answer: She is not going to push the baby out
questions.explanation: Carol says that she is not going to push the baby out.

questions.question: What does Susan say to Ross in the Lamaze class?
options: That she is going to be the mother
That she is going to be the coach
That she is going to learn how to breathe
That she is going to flip a coin to see who gets to be the coach
questions.correct_answer: That she is going to flip a coin to see who gets to be the coach
questions.explanation: Susan says that she is going to flip a coin to see who gets to be the coach.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Susan in the Lamaze class?
options: That he is going to be the coach
That he is going to be the mother
That he is going to learn how to breathe
That he is going to play his 'sperm card'
questions.correct_answer: That he is going to play his 'sperm card'
questions.explanation: Ross says that he is going to play his 'sperm card' in the Lamaze class.

questions.question: What does Chandler's boss say about firing Nina?
options: That he is going to fire her immediately
That he is not going to fire her
That he is going to wait until she is no longer a threat to herself or others
That he is going to give her a warning
questions.correct_answer: That he is going to wait until she is no longer a threat to herself or others
questions.explanation: Chandler's boss says that he is going to wait until Nina is no longer a threat to herself or others before firing her.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Joey about asking out her sister?
options: That she needs to think about it
questions.correct_answer: That it's okay
questions.explanation: Phoebe initially says that it's okay for Joey to ask out her sister Ursula.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Phoebe about asking out her sister?
options: That he's not interested in Ursula
That he's going to ask her out anyway
That he's already asked her out
questions.correct_answer: That he's going to ask her out anyway
questions.explanation: Joey says that he's going to ask Ursula out anyway, even if Phoebe doesn't give her permission.

questions.question: What does Ross say about being a father?
options: That he's not sure if he's ready
That the baby is having him
questions.correct_answer: That the baby is having him
questions.explanation: Ross says that the baby is having him, implying that he's not in control of the situation.

questions.question: What does Mr. Heckles say to Monica about the noise level?
questions.correct_answer: That it's too loud
questions.explanation: Mr. Heckles says that the noise level is too loud.

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Nina about her job?
options: That she's doing a great job
That she's going to be fired
That she's going to get a raise
questions.correct_answer: That she's not doing well
questions.explanation: Chandler says that Nina is not doing well in her job.

questions.question: What does Ross do with the doll in the Lamaze class?
options: He steps on it and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it
questions.correct_answer: He steps on it and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it
questions.explanation: Ross steps on the doll in the Lamaze class and then performs 'emergency surgery' on it.

questions.question: What does Carol say about the birth of the baby?
options: That it's going to be easy
That it's going to be hard
That she's not going to do it
questions.correct_answer: That it's going to be hard
questions.explanation: Carol says that the birth of the baby is going to be hard.
